meanings.sent1: The dog sicked on the carpet after eating too quickly.

meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride made him sicked all over his shoes.

meanings.sent1: The rotten food sicked everyone at the table.
meanings.sent2: The gruesome scene in the movie sicked her to her stomach.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled milk sicked him more than anything else.
meanings.sent4: The creepy crawlies in the dark corners sicked her out.

meanings.sent1: She sicked with a fever and sore throat.
meanings.sent2: He looked pale and sicked, so he went to see the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The flu bug sicked her for a whole week.
